short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to enable copying of code snippets from StackOverflow by showing a Copy button next to each snippet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to enable copying code snippets from Stack Overflow. It shows a Copy icon next to every code snippet. The code gets copied to the clipboard when the icon is clicked.
